c_qt_deployer_section_list_item_1: Performance: This program deploys the application several times faster (up to 10 seconds).
c_qt_deployer_section_list_item_2: Flexibility: This application has flags that help you configure the deployment for your project's needs.
c_qt_deployer_section_list_item_3: Cross-platform deployment: This application supports Windows and Linux distributions. This means that you can use it not only to deploy a project for your platform but also to deploy a project on Linux for Windows and vice versa.
c_qt_deployer_section_list_item_4: Fast creation of installers: Upon completion of the deployment, you will receive a self-contained installer of your distribution.
c_qt_deployer_section_paragraph_1: CQtDeployer is an application that extracts all dependent libraries of an executable and creates a launch script for your application.
deploy_section_headline: Deploy any C/C++ application easily with CQtDeployer
deploy_section_list_item_1: cqtdeployer is a utility call (before version 1.4, the Windows version used the %cqtdeployer% command).
deploy_section_list_item_2: -bin - the option for specifying the paths of the application executable files.
deploy_section_list_item_3: myApp.exe and myApp - the paths to the application executable files themselves.
deploy_section_list_item_4: -qmake - the option for specifying the qmake paths for Qt deployment.
deploy_section_list_item_5: -qmlDir - the option for specifying paths to QML files of the application.
deploy_section_paragraph_1: The utility transfers the paths to the executable files of the deployed programs using the -bin option.
deploy_section_paragraph_2: The transferred programs are analyzed, and a list of dependencies is generated. If the programs being deployed depend on Qt, a list of modules is formed based on the dependencies.
deploy_section_paragraph_3: Qt plugins are deployed depending on the Qt modules used.
deploy_section_paragraph_4: Then QML plugins are copied, if necessary, along with standard Qt translations.
deploy_section_paragraph_5: After completing all the described steps, scripts are generated to launch the application.
more_info_section_paragraph_1: The source code for CQtDeployer components is provided under GPL v3 licenses and is freely available on GitHub.
